news.title: Canada rescinds digital services tax after Trump cuts off U.S. trade talks
news.summary: The move comes after U.S. President Donald Trump announced over the weekend that he will be "terminating ALL discussions on Trade with Canada"

news.title: Moderna's flu vaccine shows positive late-stage trial results, paving way for combination Covid shot
news.summary: Moderna's combination jab targeting Covid-19 and influenza is in phase three study data. Moderna is developing the jab to treat both flu and the flu virus.

news.title: Trump's 'big, beautiful bill' clears key Senate hurdle after high drama
news.summary: The vote came after hours of uncertainty over whether the massive package could secure enough Republican votes to move to a final Senate vote. The vote came as the Senate is expected to vote on the measure in the next few days.

news.title: Wall Street strategist Tom Lee is aiming to create the MicroStrategy of Ethereum
news.summary: Tom Lee of Fundstrat was appointed Chairman of the Board of Directors of BitMine Immersion Technologies, effective Monday. Tom Lee was appointed chairman of the board of directors of Bit mine Imm immersion Technologies.

news.title: Google makes first foray into fusion in venture with MIT spinoff Commonwealth Fusion Systems
news.summary: Google announces partnership with Commonwealth Fusion Systems. Commonwealth Fusion is a private company spun off from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology. Here is what to know.

news.title: That cash request could be an AI deepfake stealing your money. Here’s how to wise up.
news.summary: Financial advisers and other investment professionals must become more savvy about cybercrime, experts say. Financial advisers and others must become better at spotting and preventing cybercrime.

news.title: These precious metals can tell you if stocks will rise or fall. Here’s what they’re saying now.
news.summary: The gold-platinum ratio has plunged. If this market-timing indicator is correct, stock prices will follow. The stock market is down 2.7% this year.

news.title: ‘My life has changed dramatically’: I’m 51, ‘medically retired’ and planning to move to a cheaper state. Can we do it?
news.summary: "We have $247,000 in our portfolio, $105k in a 403(b), $61k in another stock account and $15k in traditional IRA," she says.

news.title: How the Supreme Court just juiced these S&P 500 winners — and turbocharged your 401(k)
news.summary: U.S. companies could see their regulatory burden get lighter. But the stock market hasn’t yet priced this in, analysts say.

news.title: Solar stocks’ losses are nuclear’s gain, as Elon Musk takes swipe at budget bill
news.summary: The Senate’s tax-and-spending bill gives a boost to nuclear power stocks, but knocks down shares of solar companies.
